definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
collateral damage (both as a legal term, and as a military euphemism)

sentences.english: Quick-drying nail polishmay save time, but at the expense of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 快乾指甲油更方便，但會損害指甲。

sentences.english: Thermite effects changed to look like it is burning for several seconds before causing damage.
sentences.chinese: 鋁熱效應改變的樣子是前幾秒鐘燃燒造成的損害。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道損害可以在芯片上用均等化來減輕。

sentences.english: What on earth humiliates the image of "students studying abroad"?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什麼損害了“留學生”的品牌形象？

sentences.english: Radiotherapy and chemotherapy can damage the fertility and ovarian function heavily.
sentences.chinese: 放化療嚴重損害患者的卵巢功能和生育能力。

sentences.english: It hurts them, and then it hurts your reputation.
sentences.chinese: 這會傷害他們，也會損害你的名聲。

sentences.english: Author major make substantive research damages from the point of view of the scope of compensation.
sentences.chinese: 筆者主要從損害賠償範圍的角度進行實務性研究。

sentences.english: The larvae feed on the tender leaves and cause injury to Mahonia leveileana shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲取食嫩葉，對闊葉十大功勞造成嚴重損害。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the liver damages caused by antituberculosis drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解抗結核藥物引起肺結核患者的肝損害。

sentences.english: Cattle can damage forage crops by eating down to the roots.
sentences.chinese: 牛會把草根喫掉，這樣會損害飼料作物。

sentences.english: Bank of China's subprime exposure significantly hurt the pace of earnings growth last year.
sentences.chinese: 中國銀行的次債風險極大地損害了其去年的收益增長。
損害系由貴公司疏忽所致。

sentences.english: ConclusionAtorvastation can be used for early renal damage in patients with essential hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討阿託伐他汀對高血壓早期腎損害的影響。

sentences.english: One of them is how to comprehend the "serious hurt".
sentences.chinese: 其中就有對“嚴重損害就診人身體健康”的非難。

sentences.english: Don't spoil your appetite by eating sweets just before dinner.
sentences.chinese: 不要在飯前喫糖來損害你的食慾。

sentences.english: A fissure is a linear cleft through the epidermis, or into the dermis.
sentences.chinese: 裂隙是穿過表皮或深達真皮的線狀損害。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
